import React, { useReducer } from 'react' import './styles.css' const ACTIONS = { ADD_DIGIT: 'add-digit', CHOOSE_OPERTAION: 'choose-operation', EVALUATE: 'evaluate', DELETE_DIGIT: 'delete-digit', CLEAR: 'clear' } const reducer = (state, { type, payload }) => { switch (type) { case ACTIONS.ADD_DIGIT: return { ...state, currentOperand: `${currentOperand}${payload.digit}` } } } function App({ digit }) { const [{ currentOperand, previousOperand, operation }, dispatch] = useReducer(reducer(), {}) return ( <>
